findings.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential SQL injection in login endpoint

findings.title: Exposed API Key
findings.description: API key found in source code

findings.title: Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
findings.description: Critical authentication bypass found in OAuth callback handler. Improper validation of state parameter allows session fixation attacks.
findings.remediation:
1. Validate state parameter against server-side session
2. Implement CSRF token validation
3. Add rate limiting to OAuth endpoints
4. Log all authentication attempts
